column4: i need some help .. i installed a new hdd .. ubuntu only lets root read and write to this drive .. is there a way to fix this?
add your users to storage group
gpasswd or do i put my password?
i said it backwords im sorry gpasswd -a <user> storage
dude all those issues are back.. now i cant mount that drive .. could you take a look at my fstab?
dude you mind if i pvt msg ya?
yep flat out bro ... looks like im gonna sleep in peace on ma bed after all hehehe
